entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: SSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
